segments.text: Here is my ticket and seat assignment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I have a pillow and blanket , PLS ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: An attendant will pass them around after we take off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I have headphones for the in-flight movie ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Here are your headphones . Do you want something to drink ?
segments.speaker: S2
